definition: to gobble up/to gorge oneself on (food)
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])

sentences.english: I like lion eat, sleep and read books.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢猛吃，睡觉和读书。

sentences.english: He is quite fat now as a result of his bad eating habits.
sentences.chinese: 他如今膘肥体胖，都是猛吃猛喝造成的。

sentences.english: The old man punished the cold beef.
When depressed, they dramatically overindulge in chocolate and sweets.
sentences.chinese: 情绪低落的时候，她们就疯狂地猛吃巧克力和糖果。

sentences.english: The children gorged on potato chips.
This is better than going from no food to bingeing.
sentences.chinese: 这总比一点不吃到大吃猛吃要好。

sentences.english: He always makes a pig of himself at feast.
sentences.chinese: 在宴会上他总是猛吃猛喝。

sentences.english: Just now you went at your dinner as if you'd never eaten before.
sentences.chinese: 刚才你猛吃晚餐时，好像你从没吃过饭似的。

definition: to eat and drink as much as one likes/to make a pig of oneself
to wolf down one's food (idiom); to devour ravenously/to gorge oneself
to eat and drink gluttonously/to pig out
to chew on a large slab (idiom); a large mouthful is hard to chew/to tuck into a great meal
dishes with generous amounts of meat and fish/lavish meal
